ovdesc.p: Live file used during Close of Business processing to modify month end files such as SC.POS.ASSET and SC.CASH.FLOW. Keyed on change date. Contents are multivalued per security with corresponding prices.

desc.p: Multivalued field containing the SECURITY.MASTER record key(s).
Start date for the historic valuation.
End date for the historic valuation.
Keyed on change year and month (6 numerics in the format YYYYMM)
Multivalued field containing the Market Price(s).
